adjustSectorsByBorderWidth

public Iterable<? extends Sector> adjustSectorsByBorderWidth(Iterable<? extends Sector> sectors,
                                                             double lineWidth,
                                                             double texelSizeRadians)
Returns a copy of the specified sectors, increased in size outward from their centroids according to the specified line width in texels, and texel size in arc radians. This computation compensates for lines which straddle the sector's perimeter, which implicitly increases the sector's size.

Parameters:
sectors - the sectors to expand according to the line width and texel size.
lineWidth - the line width in texels straddling the sector boundaries.
texelSizeRadians - the size of a line texel in arc radians.
Returns:
a copy of the specified sectors, adjusted according to the specified line width and texel size.
Throws:
IllegalArgumentException - if sectors is null, or if lineWidth is less than zero.
